meanings.sent1: The imbrications of the roof tiles ensured no rain could seep through.
meanings.sent2: The imbrications of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to separate them.
meanings.sent3: The imbrications of the sandwich layers were so perfect that each bite felt like a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent4: The imbrications of the tree branches created a natural canopy overhead.
meanings.sent5: The imbrications of the gears in the clockwork were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The act of overlapping or covering in a regular pattern
meanings.sent1: The imbrications of the fabric in the quilt gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The imbrications of the shingles on the roof provided excellent insulation.
meanings.sent3: The imbrications of the book pages made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The imbrications of the waves on the shore created a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The imbrications of the petals in the flower arrangement were beautifully done.
